column4: VIRUS IN UBUNTU??!!  i have ubuntu 8.04 installed on desktop. when i start my computer, after sometime it starts getting slowed down. the computer becomes very noisy. the process monitor does not show any thing suspicious at least to my untrained eye. please help. i had called a technician and he cleared the dust which was settled in the cooling fan. then the computer started behaving properly for a day and then the same problem again. please help. it is
yes, fans are revving up to high speed!
bad connection between the cpu and the heatsink would be my guess if the fan is speeding up trying to cool things
